repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:14-alpine

ENV PORT 3000

RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app && rm -rf /usr/src/app
WORKDIR /usr/src/app

ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_GA_TRACKING_ID
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_CHAIN_ID
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_CHAIN_ENDPOINT
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_BLOCK_EXPLORER
ARG NEXT_PUBLIC_NFT_ENDPOINT
ARG XAUTH_PROTON_MARKET
ARG PINATA_API_KEY
ARG PINATA_SECRET
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_CHAIN_ID=$NEXT_PUBLIC_CHAIN_ID
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_CHAIN_ENDPOINT=$NEXT_PUBLIC_CHAIN_ENDPOINT
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_BLOCK_EXPLORER=$NEXT_PUBLIC_BLOCK_EXPLORER
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_GA_TRACKING_ID=$NEXT_PUBLIC_GA_TRACKING_ID
ENV NEXT_PUBLIC_NFT_ENDPOINT=$NEXT_PUBLIC_NFT_ENDPOINT
ENV XAUTH_PROTON_MARKET=$XAUTH_PROTON_MARKET
ENV PINATA_API_KEY=$PINATA_API_KEY
ENV PINATA_SECRET=$PINATA_SECRET

COPY package*.json /usr/src/app/
RUN yarn install && yarn cache clean;

COPY . /usr/src/app

RUN yarn build

EXPOSE 3000

CMD [ "yarn", "start" ]
